Jan. 22, 1949 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4824
None
Test Piece Contest
Gems of Wagner No. 2
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Yorkshire Transport, 2nd Grange Moor, 3rd Meltham Mills. Hymn tune contest - 1st Meltham Mills, 2nd Grange Moor, 3rd Yorkshire Transport. Believed to be first in the series of winter contests - British Bandsman February 5th 1949 states - contest was a great success, and it was hoped it would be an annual affair.
Feb. 10, 2014, 5:08 p.m. Feb. 10, 2014, 5:12 p.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Harold Swallow
2 Yorkshire Traction C. A. Smith
3 Kirkburton Victoria Unknown
